per_site_prompt_packs.brand_style_prompt: Direct, calm, modern SaaS tone. Keep it concrete. [example.com:home:voice.core]
per_site_prompt_packs.visual_direction_prompt: Airy layout, modern sans, restrained accent. [example.com:home:layout.rhythm]
per_site_prompt_packs.ui_direction_prompt: Card-based sections, clear CTAs, medium radius, subtle elevation. [example.com:home:radius.button]
per_site_prompt_packs.copywriting_prompt: Benefit-led headings, short sentences, crisp CTAs. [example.com:home:voice.cta_style]
per_site_prompt_packs.negative_prompt: Avoid hype, avoid noisy gradients, avoid gimmicky motion.

composite_prompt_pack.brand_style_prompt: Write in a direct, calm, modern voice. Keep sentences short and outcome-driven.
composite_prompt_pack.visual_direction_prompt: Minimal, modern UI with high-contrast typography, airy spacing, restrained colour accents.
composite_prompt_pack.ui_direction_prompt: Use 8px spacing rhythm, medium radius, subtle elevation, consistent focus rings.
composite_prompt_pack.copywriting_prompt: Plain English microcopy. Action verbs for CTAs. Calm and specific help/error text.
composite_prompt_pack.negative_prompt: Avoid loud gradients, glassmorphism overload, excessive gimmick animations.
